}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "5185-8967", "Â©2010 Hewlett-Packard Development Company, L.P.", :"[G]48RNAA0P.OGC" and "2011/07/15" are silkscreened on the board.
"48DNXA07.OGB", "(XB114_030)", "2011/04/13" is silkscreened :on the wireless modules ([[Atheros]] XB114 reference design).
This matches with [[Unex]]'s ( / ''[[Wistron NeWeb]]'''s) [http://www.unex.com.tw/product/dnxa-h1 DNXA-H1]. :Three ''[[SiGe]]'' SE2595L Front-ends (FEM) are used per card.
* WLAN Radio Module - Model: [[HP MRLBB-1003]] {{See also|HP MRLBB-1301}}
The CPU is a [[Freescale]] chip (P1020 PSE2HPA). :''[[Wistron NeWeb]]'' is the presumed manufacturer. {{See also|Aerohive HiveAP 330|Aerohive HiveAP 350}}
The same hardware is used for the MSM430, MSM460, and MSM466. *The MSM430 is a two-stream only device (integral antennas). *The MSM460 is dual-band 3x3:3 capable with integral antennas. *The MSM466 is dual-band 3x3:3 device (multi-5GHz capable) :with RP-SMA connectors.
This entry is for the Americas version of the device :there are also other area specific versions available :J9591A (World-wide), J9589A (Japan), J9618A (Israel)
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Freescale]]'' ([[NXP]]) P1020 @667MHz :SoC: Dual-core ''PowerPC'' e500 *Flash: 128MB (NAND) *Memory: 256MB (DDR3) SDRAM *Wi-Fi: [[Atheros]] AR9390 :802.11abgn (2.4GHz) 3x3:3 :[[Atheros]] AR9390 :802.11an (5GHz) 3x3:3 *Network: 1x GbE port *Power Source: 802.3af PoE
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/hpe/hpe_msm460 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = mpc85xx |subtarget = p1020 |arch = powerpc_8540 |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = snapshot |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here

==See also== :;[https://habr.com/ru/company/hpe/blog/154409/ Hewlett Packard Enterprise AP] *[[HP MSM310 (9379B)]] - Access Point (WW) :Indoor, 1x 802.11a/b/g, 2x ext. ant., 54Mbps *[[HP MSM317 (J9423A)]] - Access Device (WW) :Indoor, 5x FE, 1x 802.11a/b/g, 2x int. ant., 54Mbps *[[HP MSM410 (J9427B)]] - Access Point (WW) :Indoor, 1x 802.11a/b/g/n, 3x int. ant., 300Mbps *[[HP MSM430 (J9650A)]] - Dual Radio 802.11n AP (WW) :Indoor, 1x 802.11a/b/g/n, 6x int. ant., 600Mbps *[[HP MSM460 (J9590A)]] - Dual Radio 802.11n AP (WW) :Indoor, 2x 802.11a/b/g/n, 6x int. ant., 900Mbps *[[HP MSM466 (J9621A)]] - Dual Radio 802.11n AP (WW) :Indoor, 2x 802.11a/b/g/n, 6x ext. ant., 900Mbps *[[HP MSM466-R (J9716A)]] - Dual Radio 802.11n AP (WW) :Outdoor, 2x 802.11a/b/g/n, 6x ext. ant., 900Mbps
